attributes.name: Suspicious CronTab Creation or Modification v100.0.2
attributes.description: Identifies attempts to create or modify a crontab via a process that is not crontab (i.e python, osascript, etc.). This activity should not be highly prevalent and could indicate the use of cron as a persistence mechanism by a threat actor.
author: Elastic
attributes.query:
file where event.type != "deletion" and process.name != null and
  file.path : "/private/var/at/tabs/*" and not process.executable == "/usr/bin/crontab"
